title: What causes a lack of critical thinking skills? - Quora

response.answer_text: What causes a lack of critical thinking skills? Why think for ourselves when it’s so easy to let others do the thinking for us? Covid is the perfect example. USA. 2018. 6.5 million heart failures. No response. 2020. Less than 100,000 Covid deaths worldwide, a few whispers in the right ears and we have ourselves freely advertised full fledged pandemic, complete with enough fear to have our full support in shutting down the world. And all we gotta do is join. And we all wear our own sign.
